title: Jollies
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Puberty
abstract: An intimate and sardonic work about being an adolescent in mid-American suburbia.
description: An intimate and sardonic work about being an adolescent in mid-American suburbia. From touching the genitals of boys in school to finally getting to kiss the girl she wants, this very funny and accomplished experimental work was filmed while the director was herself a teen.
